sections.heading: Repealed.Section 28-18-2 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1990, ch. 4, § 1; 1993, ch. 34, § 1; 1993, ch. 178, § 1; 1995, ch. 69, § 4; 2011, ch. 166, § 2; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 48, § 37.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 48, § 37 repealed 28-18-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1990, ch. 4, § 1, relating to department designation, authorization, payment system effective, effective July 1, 2020. For provisions of former section,seethe 2019 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 1990, ch. 4, § 2; 1993, ch. 34, § 2; 1993, ch. 178, § 2; repealed by Laws 2019, ch. 48, § 37.

Repeals.— Laws 2019, ch. 48, § 37 repealed 28-18-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1990, ch. 4, § 2, relating to custodian of funds, effective July 1, 2020. For provisions of former section,seethe 2019 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
